WRITING.TITLE: Should this be taught in a History class?
WRITING.TEXT: In our History class, we studied the Making of Modern Britain, 1850-1950. Whilst that is history, it dealt with politics and the society of the time, laizzes faire etc. Surely that would be sociology, at a stretch modern studies?
I think it just plays Emilia clarke's voice with the subtitles, I doubt they'd make the voice actor for another language do that
